title: jax sucks as a champion, and buffing does NO GOOD
body:
his win rate is below 50%.
his is aweful champion
he needs BORK, TRINITY FORCE at least to do a tiny bit of damage
he builds BORK, TRINITY FORCE before any armor item
he builds some armor first then he never has a chance to finish even a BORK
he will never finish BORK, TRINITY FORCE cuz the game is already over
he needs to farm 24/7
he gets ton of top lane bullies to sht on him
he can be kited even with BORK, TRINITY FORCE and die like an idioot
he does 0 damage in teamfights
he has been in the game for 3-4 years and Riot still can not balance him
he had 000000000000000000 games played in ranked challenger tier over last 7 days
he had 47.00% win rate in bronze over 10,685 games played and a terrifying 1.81:1 KDA
he rank #102 of all champs in diamond last 7 days even a leona top can beat him
he will never be able to farm 1 single CS if behind by even a little, no ranged waveclear
he was never played even 1 game in world championship 2014 out of 61 champions played  
he got an awesome 44% win rate today in all diamond games NA  

he sucks BY DESIGN


PS:
look at that shyvana top
look at that hec top
look at that rumble top
look at that shen top
look at that maokai top
look at that nautilus top
look at that ryze top
look at that trundle top


THEY OWN the game with just 1 damage item
THEY OWN this little jax till he is so sad and AFK uninstall

replies.body:
Are you a literal troll or what? The only legit thing you said was that he has a below 50% winrate. Everything else is asinine and absolutely laughable that im not going to waste an hour to debunk your points but instead im going to call out your bs with the other champs you listed that "THEY do not even need 1 damage item and still does massive damage to your backline"

>Shyvana

She's completely lack luster in all regards in the top lane. If she isnt winning her trades then she loses lane hard.  And if she doesnt build BotRK or any damaging item then she falls off extremely hard becoming irrelevant. 

>Hec

He needs to build Triforce inorder to do any damage and be a backline threat.

>Rumble

Needs an offensive item to be of any threat. In fact, majority of his builds consists of nothing of offensive.


>Shen

Still does little damage but all he is is a walking taunt which has an extremely small hitbox and an R. He splitpushes extremely slow. Especially when compared to Jax. Not a back line threat as he can be easily ignored if he doesnt build TF or BotRK

>Maokai 

A lot of times he builds ROA which contributes to his offensiveness during the lane phase. Other than that, he is a front liner, not a back liner.

>Nautilus

He's better as a support due to his CC but he doesnt deal much damage. Especially without AP items. Again, front liner. Not a back one.

>Ryze 

He still builds AP. He is not longer as big of a threat in the early game but he still needs AP items to do anything.

>Trundle

Trundle's first item majority of the time is BotRk.  

Dont even bother trying to post a refute because I wont respond as it'll be a waste a time.

DO YOU WATCH LCS?????????

Gold 3?????????????????????? LOOOOOOOOOL

Who give you the privilege to think even 1 word you say is right?

I beat gold 3 with 2 fingers.

Are you f**king kidding me???????

I would think twice about what u say if you are above plat 4 or anything close.

The only thing I didn't say correctly was 
"THEY do not even need 1 damage item and still does massive damage to your backline  "


That applies to Ryze, Hec and rumble, not Maokai or some other ones.
I removed that piece. everything else is valid.

It's funny because rank is irrelevant when it comes to matters of discussion and Jax has **always** seen on and off professional play. Just because he doesn't fit into the current meta doesn't mean he's a bad champion. Also winrate by itself is essentially useless for determining champion strength.

Ah, ok.  This post makes me understand you now.
Nothing more to add.

He's really good once he gets TF & BoRK but falls off when everyone has 4-6 items since his damage remains pretty similar to what he had on 2 items and he can no longer bust targets immediately. He's pretty weak in teamfights but always a good split-pusher. The thing is, you can just play Irelia and do most things for most of the game a lot better.

you do have to understand 1 thing if you are not bronze:

TF & BoRK item cost = 6 armor items

U DO THE MATH

> [{quoted}](name=Xiao Long Nv,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KciT4vyU,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-07-03T19:52:43.305+0000)
>
> you do have to understand 1 thing if you are not bronze:
> 
> TF & BoRK item cost = 6 armor items
> 
> U DO THE MATH

Jax's ult passive and w do a lot of magic damage.   Magic damage vs armor

YOU DO THE MATH
Can u do damage after u get blowed up instantly  after they kite ur ult

> [{quoted}](name=Xiao Long Nv,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KciT4vyU,comment-id=0001000100000000,timestamp=2015-07-03T23:17:53.493+0000)
>
> Can u do damage after u get blowed up instantly  after they kite ur ult

Assuming your arent stupid, not really. Leapstrike + stun + botrk sctive + phage makes it pretty hard to kite jax. Not to mention leapstrike has a pretty low cd.

Lastly, I mentioned ult passive. The ult itself actually gives a shit ton of armor and mr. But you probably know that. Its not like you made a jax thread without playing spot of games with him recently, right?

you also have to understand 1 thing if you are not bronze:

opponent can force baron dragon tower, if you split push 4 vs 5
if you TP and 5 vs 5, you loose
irelia owns pathetic little jax so hard. jax will sit under tower with 10 cs by 30 minutes if irelia baby sit him whole game.

are you just bad with jax?
I can 1v1 any 6 item carry with just tri lol
Hes played nothing but ARAM recently and got Jax and did awful. In ranked the only thing he ever plays is Fiddlesticks, and he usually doesn't do very well. Surprisingly he is plat 2 though.
Ty for appreciation I was diamond few weeks ago. Just dropped to my play 2 promo.
he rank #102 of all champs in diamond last 7 days even a leona top can beat him
he had 47.00% win rate in bronze over 10,685 games played and a terrifying 1.81:1 KDA
he also had 000000000000000000 games played in ranked challenger tier over last 7 days

You complain about Jax having a 47% win rate in the top lane, then cite Shyvana as your first example, who has the same exact win rate in top lane.

Just saying.
